column5: What happens if someone breaks the quarantine rules? This just posted on the CKDR site https://www.ckdr.net/2020/07/04/minn...uarantine-act/ . The news article did not give any details as to why the couple were allowed to cross the border in the first place, possibly tourist camp owners? No matter what, it looks like CBP is serious.
Better to stop for gas than run out
Yes, it does. Rules are rules --- and they should apply to everybody.........
I wonder if that cpl would have been ok if it was gas stop or a food stop?
If this is a true story and they only got $1000 fine that's totally worth the risk to me for where I'm gonna go up there
Quarantine police, eh? Rules are rules, need to follow to the degree practicable. I assume the couple will contend that they did, authorities will contend that they didn't, hmph! Bill
